short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons to pokemon-showdown to show your cloud uploaded teams and some sample teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds buttons to play.pokemonshowdown.com to show your showdown your cloud uploaded teams and some sample teams.
source code available at https://github.com/zooki2006/extrabuttonshowdownplugin.

friends list button has been added to the default client in this commit
https://github.com/smogon/pokemon-showdown/commit/72413823ce30131c2f3cc627e9c0b1eec51f5050
